record.field: Product Sales by Customer for the last 6 Month (XLSX)
Product Sales by Customer for the last 6 Month

Report Parameters: Partners, Company Header Fields: Print Date, The User who printed the report. Document Body: Fields: Customer, Product, Ordered Quantity, Unit Price, Subtotal Group By: Customer, Product, Month Aggregate: Sum Quantity, Average Unit Price, Sum Subtotal Sort:Ascending Customer, Ascending Product Report footer fields: Total Quantity, Total Subtotal Menu Full Path: Sales/Reporting/Product Sales by Customer for the last 6 Month (XLSX)
